titles.title: Medical Device Recall Improvement Act of 2025
Medical Device Recall Improvement Act of 2025
A bill to improve medical device recall notifications by amending the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to establish an electronic format for device recall notifications, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
